item.title: Pepper Veggie Sauce
item.description: Ingredients All the types of Bell peppers you can find Jalape√±os Onion Garlic Olive oil Lemons Instructions In a baking tray add the whole garlic with the top chopped. add olive oil to the garlic. add the rest of the veggies chopped in chunks so they get cooked. Cook for 35-40 min. Remove the cloves from the whole garlic. move the veggies to a blender. Add lemon juice While mixing them use olive oil to emulsify the mix.

item.title: Pulled Pork (Instant Pot)
item.description: Ingredients Pork Shoulder ~1kg Chili Powder (Maybe paprica) 4 tbsp Salt 1 tbsp Cumin 2 tsp Oregano Onion Powder 1 tsp Olive oil Garlic Powder 1 tsp Don’t follow the measurements they are approximates use your own and experiment with flavor Instructions Seasoning the pork Mix all the spices into a bowl and mix them. Dry the pork shoulder. With your hands add Olive oil to the meat so the spices stick to it.

item.title: Sweet Potato Gnocchi
item.description: Ingredients Sweet Potato Flour Instructions Pierce the sweet potato with a fork. Bake them in the oven. Take the skin out. make mashed sweet potato. Add salt. Add flour and mix with your hands until its a dough. Take the dough and make it a ball Cut the ball into 4 and make for each a long snake Then cut the snake into the gnocchi source: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/udaSYLYGaaA

item.title: White Sauce For Pasta
item.description: Ingredients Milk Flour Butter Mushrooms Instructions Sauce Melt the butter (~80g) on a pot at low heat. add 2 spoons of flour add 400ml of milk progressively to the pot Mushrooms Cut the mushrooms into slices. Cook the slices in a pan (optional, use butter). Add Salt and pepper to the mushrooms. Transfer the mushrooms to the pot with the white sauce.

item.title: Peruvian Chaufa
item.description: Ingredients Rice Sesame oil Garlic (1 clove) Red Pepper (cubes) Collar (Strips) Broccoli Chinese bean Protein (Chicken, Pork, Beef) (Sliced small) (Fry on sesame oil and soy) Soy sauce Egg Kion Chinese onion Instructions Preparation Prepare a Clove of Garlic Make a scrambled egg tortilla and do some slices Prepare broccoli branches Cut the collar into strips Cut Pepper into cubes Cut the Kion as small Rice Start with Sesame oil Add 1/2 of a clove of garlic A nail of kion Rest of ingredients Start with Sesame oil Add the protein Add Broccoli Add Collar Add Chinese bean Add the rest Mix Add the Pan with the protein and ingredients into the Rice cooker or pot.

item.title: Sweet_potato_dessert
item.description: Ingredients Sweet potato mandarins Instructions Chop the sweet potato into slices as thick as your finger. Slice the mandarin. Add the sweet potato to a container for the oven. Squeeze the mandarin into the sweet potato. Start the oven in high heat and once the oven is hot lower it down. If they look dry squeeze more juice. Bonus You can also add aluminum foil on top once the sweet potato is crisp.

item.title: Teriyaki Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Soy sauce Mirin sauce Sake Sugar Instructions Add equal parts of Soy sauce, Mirin and Sake. Stir and then add half part sugar. Extras You can also add garlic and onions by grating them in any cheese grater. These add a bit of a kick to the sauce.

item.title: Cup Brownie
item.description: Ingredients 1 and 1/2 tbsp butter 30g cocoa 2 tbsp sugar 2 tbsp milk 4 tbsp all purpose flour 1/4 tsp baking powder pinch salt Instructions add butter to cup and place into microwave until its melted tilt the cup to get the sides of the cup with butter add the flour, cocoa, sugar and baking powder. mix and then add the milk place in the microwave again checking constantly
